definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
Qianlong Emperor (1711-1799), sixth Qing emperor, princely title 寶親王|宝亲王[Bao3 Qin1 wang2], personal name 弘曆|弘历[Hong2 li4], reigned 1735-1799
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe

sentences.english: Not very much. You are a turnkey at the Conciergerie?
sentences.chinese: 要你乾的並不太多。你在附屬監獄管牢房麼？

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而乾的樹枝，都是因樹死而凋落下來的。

sentences.english: Tell me, Monsieur Thenardier, is what we have done permissible?
sentences.chinese: 我們乾的這種事，德納第先生，你說說，是允許的嗎？

sentences.english: Dried rhizome of rehmannia and other herbs are also added.
sentences.chinese: 同時也會加一些乾地黃和其他的草藥。

sentences.english: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它不會傳染或寄居於死的或乾的植體組織。

sentences.english: Insert it in the foam while it drys .
Tears have dried, but in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 眼淚已流乾，心卻在滴血。

sentences.english: The robbery was an inside job.
sentences.chinese: 這樁竊案是內部的人乾的。

sentences.english: So what else could China do with the money?
sentences.chinese: 中國還能拿這些錢來乾點兒什麼呢？

sentences.english: I couldn't resist asking him whether he was dying to eat some pork with fermented mustard greens.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住問他會不會很想喫梅乾扣肉？

sentences.english: He works and works, but he never seems to accomplish anything.
sentences.chinese: 他幹呀乾的，好像也沒有幹成什麼事。

sentences.english: But voters will judge him by how he played it.
sentences.chinese: 但投票者將會從他乾的好不好來判斷他。

sentences.english: Medium full-bodied dry red wine in dark ruby color.
sentences.chinese: 中度至豐滿酒體乾紅葡萄酒，深寶石紅色澤。

sentences.english: dry red table wine from the Rioja region of northern Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙北部里奧哈地區進餐時引用的乾紅葡萄酒。

definition: to obey/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing wood and wind/☴/ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
surname Qi/also used in place names
variant of 夭[yao1]/to die young/to die prematurely/Taiwan pr. [yao3]
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
